mapper.select: select * from wishlist where userNum=${userNum} and publicOption=1 order by createdAt desc
mapper.insert: insert into wishlist (num, publicOption, userNum, productNum) values (null, #{publicOption}, #{userNum}, #{productNum})
mapper.select: select p.thumbnailImageUrl, p.name, p.price, w.num, w.publicOption, w.userNum, w.productNum from wishlist w inner join product p on w.productNum = p.num where userNum=#{userNum} order by createdAt desc
mapper.update: update wishlist set publicOption=#{publicOption} where num=#{num}
